name: Pencil Dart
description:
https://github.com/eddie-ecc/CENTRIAxECCGameJam2

CENTRIA x ECC Game Jam

Art: Miko, Tapio, Anna.

Programmer: Gunji, Takashi, Jesse Lintilä

Press lightblue button in games Itchi.io page to play game in fullscreen.

Throw the pen and try to pierce as many paper items as possible in 30 seconds.

Controls move horizontally with left arrow key/a or right arrow key/d. Press leftmousebutton down and aim while moving mouse. Relese leftmousebutton to shoot pen.
